A esa hora yo fui actor.
At that hour I was an actor.

Todos los años yo era dentista.
Every year I was a dentist.

Todos los días tú eras dentista.
(tú) Every day you were a dentist.

Él me dijo que ella era cocinera.
He told me that she was a cook.

Todas las mañanas nosotros éramos estudiantes.
Él me dijo que ustedes eran actores.
(ustedes) He told me that you all were actors.
